title: In what font are written the capital letters in this poster?
author: aneta

comments.content: I`m searching for the font in which the capital letters on the poster are written. Pls help -)
It looks like **[Van Condensed Bold](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317154955/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/rsantos/van-condensed/)** by Ricardo Santos [Vanarchiv, 2004]

Fivos, you beat me to it:

[http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/rsantos/van-condensed/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317154955/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/rsantos/van-condensed/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/rsantos/van-condensed/")

The numbers seem to match as well, though I initially thought the gap in the capital G was too wide....
thanks. I like it a lot
